name: CountNumbersforKids
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is for little kids and this skill will make them enjoy learning how to count numbers 1-10. It is real fun hearing this counting songs. Just ask alexa whats flash briefing and you get to listen to this fun count your numbers skills. Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
